Description.Name: Expanded Med Bay
Description.Details: Welcome to the Med Bay Commander! As you can see, we have done a great job of treating injured MechWarriors. Unfortunately, we are only using about half of the space available to us. Since we have the power and structure in place, I would like permission to expand the facilities and staff in order to handle the injuries we are seeing. I can add another six beds and more support staff. The cost includes maintenance and salaries for +2 MedTechs.

AssignedCastDescription: We're taking enough injuries to keep our current medical staff fully tasked, Commander, and that makes me worry about our future capacity. These battles aren't getting any easier. We have the space to expand the Med Bay and I think we should use it.
